statements: SELECT * FROM DerivativesContracts ORDER BY contract_id DESC;
SELECT contract_type, trade_execution_date FROM DerivativesContracts WHERE asset_class = 'Equity';
SELECT counterparty_id, notional_amount FROM DerivativesContracts WHERE contract_status IN ('Active', 'Expired');
SELECT * FROM DerivativesContracts WHERE notional_amount > 100000;
SELECT contract_id, contract_type, trade_execution_date FROM DerivativesContracts ORDER BY trade_execution_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM DerivativesContracts ORDER BY trade_execution_date DESC, notional_amount ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT contract_id, contract_type, asset_class FROM DerivativesContracts WHERE counterparty_id = 1001
SELECT contract_id, contract_type, trade_execution_date, notional_amount FROM DerivativesContracts ORDER BY trade_execution_date DESC
SELECT * FROM DerivativesContracts WHERE contract_type = 'Future' AND asset_class = 'Equity'
SELECT contract_id, contract_type, contract_status FROM DerivativesContracts WHERE contract_status = 'Active'
SELECT contract_name, contract_type, contract_amount FROM financial_derivatives_contracts;
SELECT trade_id, trade_date, trade_status, trade_price FROM trade_execution_details;
SELECT * FROM financial_derivatives_contracts ORDER BY expiration_date DESC;
SELECT contract_name, contract_type FROM financial_derivatives_contracts WHERE contract_amount > 1000;
SELECT trade_id, trade_quantity FROM trade_execution_details WHERE trade_status = 'completed';
SELECT * FROM financial_derivatives_contracts ORDER BY contract_id DESC;
SELECT contract_name, contract_type, expiration_date FROM financial_derivatives_contracts WHERE contract_amount > 1000;
SELECT contract_name, contract_type, contract_amount FROM financial_derivatives_contracts WHERE expiration_date < '2022-12-31';
SELECT contract_id, contract_name, expiration_date FROM financial_derivatives_contracts WHERE contract_type = 'Option';
SELECT contract_id, contract_name, contract_amount FROM financial_derivatives_contracts WHERE expiration_date = (SELECT MAX(expiration_date) FROM financial_derivatives_contracts);
SELECT * FROM Contracts ORDER BY start_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT contract_id, contract_type, start_date, end_date FROM Contracts WHERE status = 'Active';
SELECT counterparty_id, name, country FROM Counterparties WHERE rating = 'AAA' ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT trade_id, trade_date, trade_type, trade_amount FROM TradeDetails WHERE trade_location = 'New York' AND trader_id = 12345;
SELECT contract_id, notional_amount FROM Contracts WHERE end_date > '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM Contracts ORDER BY start_date DESC, contract_id;
SELECT contract_id, contract_type, status FROM Contracts WHERE status = 'Active';

SELECT c.contract_id, c.contract_type, c.notional_amount, td.trade_date FROM Contracts c INNER JOIN TradeDetails td ON c.contract_id = td.contract_id WHERE c.contract_type = 'Swap' AND td.trade_amount > 100000 ORDER BY td.trade_date DESC;
SELECT cp.name, cp.country, COUNT(td.trade_id) AS num_trades FROM Counterparties cp LEFT JOIN TradeDetails td ON cp.counterparty_id = td.trader_id GROUP BY cp.name, cp.country HAVING num_trades > 5;

SELECT td.trader_id, SUM(td.trade_amount) AS total_trade_amount FROM TradeDetails td INNER JOIN Contracts c ON td.contract_id = c.contract_id WHERE c.status = 'Active' GROUP BY td.trader_id ORDER BY total_trade_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM financial_derivatives_contracts;
SELECT contract_id, contract_name, start_date, end_date FROM financial_derivatives_contracts;
SELECT contract_name, contract_type, start_date, end_date FROM financial_derivatives_contracts ORDER BY contract_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM trade_execution_details WHERE execution_price > 1000;
SELECT counterparty_name, email FROM counterparty_details;
SELECT * FROM financial_derivatives_contracts LIMIT 5;
SELECT contract_name, start_date, end_date FROM financial_derivatives_contracts WHERE contract_type = 'Option';
SELECT counterparty_name, email, phone_number FROM counterparty_details WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL ORDER BY counterparty_name ASC;
SELECT trade_id, execution_date, executed_quantity, execution_price FROM trade_execution_details ORDER BY execution_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM risk_assessment WHERE risk_score > 4.5 AND risk_rating = 'High' ORDER BY risk_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM derivatives_contracts ORDER BY contract_id DESC, contract_end_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT contract_id, contract_type, notional_amount FROM derivatives_contracts WHERE counterpart_party = 'ABC Company';
SELECT * FROM trade_execution WHERE trade_type = 'Buy' AND execution_quantity > 100 ORDER BY execution_price DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT party_name, party_type FROM parties WHERE party_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT instrument_name, asset_class FROM instrument_types WHERE asset_class = 'Equities' OR asset_class = 'Fixed Income';
SELECT * FROM derivatives_contracts ORDER BY contract_start_date DESC, notional_amount ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT contract_id, contract_type, counterpart_party FROM derivatives_contracts WHERE contract_type = 'Futures' AND notional_amount > 100000 ORDER BY contract_start_date ASC;

SELECT parties.party_name, trade_history.action_type, trade_history.action_timestamp FROM parties JOIN trade_history ON parties.party_id = trade_history.user_id WHERE trade_history.action_type = 'Amendment' ORDER BY trade_history.action_timestamp DESC;

SELECT trade_id, execution_date, execution_price FROM trade_execution JOIN derivatives_contracts ON trade_execution.contract_id = derivatives_contracts.contract_id WHERE derivatives_contracts.contract_type = 'Options' ORDER BY trade_execution.execution_date ASC;

SELECT party_name, party_type, COUNT(*) AS total_trades FROM parties JOIN trade_execution ON parties.party_id = trade_execution.contract_id GROUP BY party_name, party_type HAVING total_trades > 5 ORDER BY total_trades DESC;
